# Calm Animals (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Emotion Spells|emotion]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[Animal (Domain)|Animal 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Targets:** Animals within 30 ft. of each other

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 252

This spell soothes and quiets animals, rendering them docile and harmless. Only ordinary animals (those with Intelligence scores of 1 or 2) can be affected by this spell. All the subjects must be of the same kind, and no two may be more than 30 feet apart. The maximum number of HD of animals you can affect is equal to 2d4 + caster level.

The affected creatures remain where they are and do not attack or flee. They are not [[Helpless|helpless]] and defend themselves normally if attacked. Any threat breaks the spell on the threatened creatures.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added emotion descriptor per *Ultimate Magic*. 

                       Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
